root.name: Travian
root.description: Travian is a browser bassed real time strategy. You start off with a single village at the start of the game and from their expand and conquer your rivals.External LinksPlay Travian: http://browsergame.travian.com/Travian forum: http://forum.travian.com/forum.phpTravian Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/traviannews
